item.description:
The 34th Annual Oktoberfest and Honk Festival

Details:

October 7th - The 34th Annual Oktoberfest and Honk Festival Parade (parade @ 1:30PM)

Featuring six stages of live entertainment, dozens of restaurant vendors, hundreds of street vendors selling artworks, jewelry, vintage clothing, neighborhood sidewalk sales, and HONK! Bands from around the country!

RAINDATE: MONDAY, OCTOBER 8th..Go to www.harvardsqaure. for last minute updates

 

 

 

Here's the SCHEDULE

 

12:30 - 1:30 Gather at Charlie's Beer Garden for Lunch

1:30 HONK! PARADE @ Winthrop Park

 

2:15 VEVERSITSE @ Winthorp Park

 

3:15 EMPEROR NORTON'S STATIONARY MARCHING BAND @ Charlie's Kitchen

 

3:45 HUNGRY MARCHING BAND (Church & Mass Ave)

 

4:30 MINOR MISHAP MARChING BAND (Palrmer Alley - Havrard Coop Pedestrian walkway)

 

5-6 PINK PUFFERS BRASS BAND @ Main Stage in front of the Harvard Coop Main Entrance

 

6 - 8 PM John Harvard's Brew House
item.how_to_find_us: This is a roaming event. BE @ Charlies @ 12PM. I will be seated at a table in the Beer Garden
item.name: OKTOBERFEST
